This page describes which packages and configuration files need to be installed on Ubuntu for Japanese to be supported.

For other languages, see DapperL10nSprint.

=== Fonts used ===

* ttf-kochi-gothic
* ttf-kochi-mincho
* cmap-adobe-japan1 (Note: to get the pdftoppm to work I had to create a file ~/.xpdfrc and add:
cMapDir Adobe-Japan1 /usr/share/fonts/cmap/adobe-japan1) 
* cmap-adobe-japan2
* ttf-kochi-mincho
* ttf-kochi-gothic
* ttf-sazanami-gothic
* ttf-sazanami-mincho
* Also from: <nowiki>[[http://www.adobe.com/products/acrobat/acrrasianfontpack.html]]</nowiki>
